ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL CANADA to conclude a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PROFESSIONAL INSTITUTE OF THE PUBLIC SERVICE OF CANADA covering all the employees in the Research Officers/Research Council Officers Bargaining Unit, which agreement expires on July 19, 2011.
